name: Xianglong Ephemera
description: A dragon’s spirit graces your path.

languages.description: Der Geist eines Drachens ziert deinen Weg.
languages.name: Ephemera: Xianglong

languages.description: L'esprit d'un dragon orne votre chemin.
languages.name: Ephemera Xianglong

languages.description: Lo spirito di un drago orna il tuo cammino.
languages.name: Ephemera Xianglong

languages.description: 당신이 나아가는 길을 용의 혼이 축복합니다.
languages.name: 상룡 이페메라

languages.description: El espíritu de un dragón adorna tu camino.
languages.name: Efímero Xianglong

languages.description: 祥龙之气为你的道路增光添彩。
languages.name: 祥龙幻纹

languages.description: Пусть дух дракона украсит ваш путь.
languages.name: Эфемера: Сянлун

languages.description: ドラゴンの精神が道のりを飾る。
languages.name: Xianglong エフェメラ

languages.description: Duch smoka towarzyszy Ci w drodze.
languages.name: Efemera Xianglong

languages.description: O espírito de um dragão agracia seu caminho.
languages.name: Efêmera: Xianglong

languages.description: 祥龍的精神一路上與我們同在。
languages.name: 祥龍幻紋

languages.description: เทพมังกรขยับด้วยท่วงท่าที่พลิ้วไหวไปตามเส้นทางของคุณ
languages.name: อิเฟมเมอรา Xianglong
